Question
========
In een mixed design studie hebben alle proefpersonen een score op
**\[--I--\]** niveau(s) van de within-subjects variabele, en
op** \[--II--\]** niveau(s) van de between-subjects variabele.

Answerlist
----------
* I. alle  
  II. één
* I. één  
  II. alle
* I. alle  
  II. alle
* I. één  
  II. één

Solution
========





Between group factor means that the participants are split in the
categories of this factor. Within factor means that the all participants
are tested in all conditions of this factor.
